snippet: Amy Sheng is a co-founder of CellScope, a smartphone attachment that allows parents to take videos of a child’s middle ear that can be sent to doctors for an ear-infection diagnosis.
abstract: Amy Sheng is a co-founder of CellScope, a smartphone attachment that allows parents to take videos of a child’s middle ear that can be sent to doctors for an ear-infection diagnosis.

headline.main: When It Takes a Woman to Design Products for Women
